name: part_002
file: tmp_【#尾丸ポルカ生誕祭2026】Glitter of Love⧸誕生日記念3DLIVE【尾丸ポルカ⧸ホロライブ】 [zzVcTQOdLZE]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: Omaru Polka performs a solo rendition of 'ETERNAL BLAZE' on a fire-themed stage.
Omaru Polka welcomes the audience, introduces the live's theme 'Glitter of Love', and announces a record number of guests.
Omaru Polka and Yuzuki Choco perform 'Seiten Galaxy Cross' together on a starry, heart-themed stage.

subtitles.original: 未来へー
subtitles.english: To the future!

subtitles.original: 強く果てない未来へー
subtitles.english: To a strong and endless future!

subtitles.original: そう、いつどこから始まる
subtitles.english: Yes, whenever and wherever it begins...

subtitles.original: お待たせみんなー！
subtitles.english: Sorry to keep you waiting, everyone!

subtitles.original: 今年もポルカの誕生日が始まったー！
subtitles.english: Polka's birthday celebration has begun again this year!

subtitles.original: タイトルは、かっこいい、Glitter of Love！
subtitles.english: The title is the cool-sounding "Glitter of Love"!

subtitles.original: というわけで、
subtitles.english: And so,

subtitles.original: ハッシュタグはこちら！
subtitles.english: here is the hashtag!

subtitles.original: #尾丸ポルカ生誕祭2026で
subtitles.english: Please use #OmaruPolkaBirthday2026 and

subtitles.original: いっぱい、いっぱい、呟いてね！はい！
subtitles.english: tweet about it lots and lots! Okay!

subtitles.original: いやー、今回のテーマがまず、愛と勇気と戦う女の子になってます。
subtitles.english: Well, first off, the theme this time is "a girl who fights with love and courage."

subtitles.original: そして、
subtitles.english: And also,

subtitles.original: 見てください、このステージ！えい！
subtitles.english: look at this stage! Tah-dah!

subtitles.original: はぁー、すごい広い。おー。
subtitles.english: Wow, it's so huge. Ohhh.

subtitles.original: なんとですね、広いんですけど、まずスクリーンが超大きい！
subtitles.english: Can you believe how big it is? And the screen is giant!

subtitles.original: 大迫力！
subtitles.english: What an impact!

subtitles.original: なんと、なんかいつもの3倍くらい頑張りました。
subtitles.english: I worked about three times as hard as usual on this.

subtitles.original: いや、頑張ってもらいました。
subtitles.english: Or rather, I had everyone work that hard for me.

subtitles.original: ありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: Thank you so much!

subtitles.original: というわけでですね、ここからゲストの方々が、たくさんいらっしゃいます。
subtitles.english: And now, we have a lot of guests coming on.

subtitles.original: もうホロメンだけなら、多分尾丸ポルカ史上最多のゲスト数だと思っております。
subtitles.english: Counting just Hololive members, I think it's the most guests I've ever had.

subtitles.original: それをね、これからノンストップでお送りするので、楽しんでいってください！
subtitles.english: We'll be presenting them non-stop from here, so please enjoy!

subtitles.original: というわけで、行くぞー！
subtitles.english: Alright then, let's go!

subtitles.original: 遺伝子レベルの
subtitles.english: On a genetic level...

subtitles.original: Independence
subtitles.english: Independence

subtitles.original: 絶望も希望も
subtitles.english: Despair and hope alike,

subtitles.original: 抱いて
subtitles.english: embrace them.

subtitles.original: あがけ命尽きるまで
subtitles.english: Struggle until your life is spent.

subtitles.original:
星天ギャラクシィクロス
作詞・作曲：上松範康(Elements Garden)
subtitles.english:
Seiten Galaxy Cross
Lyrics/Composition: Noriyasu Agematsu (Elements Garden)

subtitles.original: 光と飛沫のKiss 恋のような虹のバースデイ
subtitles.english: A kiss of light and spray, a rainbow birthday like love.

subtitles.original: どんな美しき日も 何か生まれ 何かが死ぬ
subtitles.english: No matter how beautiful the day, something is born and something dies.

subtitles.original: せめて歌おう I love you 世界が地獄だとしても
subtitles.english: At least let's sing "I love you," even if the world is hell.

subtitles.original: せめて伝えよう I love you 解放の時は来た
subtitles.english: At least let's convey "I love you," the time for liberation has come.

subtitles.original: 星降る天へと 響き飛べ Every body song
subtitles.english: To the starry heavens, echo and fly, everybody's song!

subtitles.original: Stardust
subtitles.english: Stardust

subtitles.original: そして奇跡は 待つものじゃなくて
subtitles.english: And miracles aren't something to wait for,

subtitles.original: その手で創るものと 吠えろ
subtitles.english: they are things you create with those hands. Roar!

subtitles.original: 涙した過去への鎮魂歌をレクイエムにして
subtitles.english: Turn the requiem for a tearful past into a song.

subtitles.original: 聖なる全力 全智 全力で
subtitles.english: With sacred all-out power, all-out wisdom and power!

subtitles.original: 輝けFuture 信じ照らせ 星天ギャラクシィクロス
subtitles.english: Shine, Future! Believe and illuminate, Seiten Galaxy Cross!

subtitles.original: 一人じゃないことを やがて君は知る日のため
subtitles.english: For the day you finally realize you are not alone,

subtitles.original: 指先伝うアストロ 分かち合って明日へ向かう
subtitles.english: astro traveling through fingertips, let's share and head for tomorrow.

subtitles.original: 永遠なる空に I feel you 自由の魂は 閉ざせはしない
subtitles.english: In the eternal sky, I feel you. The soul of freedom will not be closed off!

subtitles.original: 不滅なる夢に I feel you 未来へと手を握れ
subtitles.english: In an immortal dream, I feel you. Grasp hands toward the future!

subtitles.original: 運命も 終極も 断ち切る力で
subtitles.english: With the power to cut through fate and the ultimate end!

subtitles.original: そして重ねた夢を
subtitles.english: And these overlapping dreams...
